title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Try as you might, life probably wont let you remain in a comfy bubble now. Perhaps you just want to coast through your day without any wild swings toward heart-stopping excitement or mind-numbing boredom. However, some turbulence may crop up today, not only to keep you on your toes, but to help you connect with others without tuning them out. Be attentive to peoples subtle emotional cues. Staying in your own lane sounds like an ideal strategy, but people might need to hear a little more enthusiasm from you. Poet Maya Angelou wrote, Try to be a rainbow in someones cloud. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
